metadata.disclaimer: Based on publicly available crosswalks and expert analysis. Validate with qualified assessors for compliance/audit use.

clauses.title: Board and Senior Management Oversight
clauses.rationale: PM-01 program plan; PM-02 senior roles; PM-03 resources; PM-09 risk strategy.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM requires specific board-level technology risk governance. SP 800-53 covers security program management but board-level oversight specifics (board IT committee, CTO/CIO accountability) are less explicit.

clauses.title: Technology Risk Management Framework
clauses.rationale: PM-01/PM-09 security/risk programs; RA-01/RA-03 risk assessment; PM-28 risk framing.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM requires a comprehensive technology risk management framework. SP 800-53 provides the security framework but MAS-specific technology risk governance structure partially addressed.

clauses.title: IT Project Management and Security-by-Design
clauses.rationale: SA family covers security in development; PM-07 enterprise architecture.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM requires IT project management with security integration. SP 800-53 covers security in development but project management methodology not addressed.

clauses.title: Software Application Development and Management
clauses.rationale: SA family comprehensive for software development security.
clauses.gaps: Minor: MAS TRM includes source code review requirements. SA-11 covers developer testing/review.

clauses.title: IT Service Management
clauses.rationale: CM-03 change management; SI-02 patch management; IR-04 incident management; CA-07 monitoring.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM requires ITIL-style service management. SP 800-53 covers security aspects but full IT service management (problem management, release management, SLA management) not in scope.

clauses.title: IT Resilience
clauses.rationale: CP family comprehensive for IT resilience including contingency, backup, recovery.
clauses.gaps: Minor: MAS TRM includes specific RPO/RTO requirements and disaster recovery testing frequency. SP 800-53 CP family covers but MAS-specific requirements need supplementation.

clauses.title: Access Control
clauses.rationale: AC and IA families comprehensive for access control.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap. SP 800-53 AC/IA families well aligned with MAS TRM access control requirements.

clauses.title: Cryptography
clauses.rationale: SC-12 key management; SC-13 cryptographic protection; SC-28 encryption at rest; SC-08 encryption in transit.
clauses.gaps: Minor: MAS TRM includes specific cryptographic algorithm requirements aligned with Singapore standards. SP 800-53 defers to NIST cryptographic standards.

clauses.title: Data and Infrastructure Security
clauses.rationale: SC-07 network security; CM family configuration; SI-03/SI-04 malware/monitoring; MP family media protection.
clauses.gaps: Minor: MAS TRM includes specific requirements for data centre security and network architecture.

clauses.title: Cyber Security Operations
clauses.rationale: SI-04 monitoring; AU-06 audit review; IR-04 incident handling; CA-07 continuous monitoring; PM-16 threat awareness; RA-10 threat hunting.
clauses.gaps: Minor: MAS TRM includes specific SOC requirements and cyber surveillance expectations.

clauses.title: Cyber Security Assessment
clauses.rationale: CA-02 security assessments; CA-08 penetration testing; RA-05 vulnerability scanning; PM-14 testing.
clauses.gaps: Minor: MAS TRM includes red teaming and scenario-based testing requirements.

clauses.title: Online Financial Services
clauses.rationale: SC-07 boundary; SC-08 transmission; IA-02 authentication; AC-17 remote access; SC-13 cryptography.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM has specific online financial services security requirements (online banking, payment security). SP 800-53 covers general security but financial service-specific requirements need supplementation.

clauses.title: Payment Card Security
clauses.rationale: SC-07 boundary; SC-28 encryption; AC-03 access control; AU-02 audit events.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM defers to PCI DSS but adds MAS-specific requirements. SP 800-53 provides general controls; payment-specific controls need PCI DSS supplementation.

clauses.title: Technology Risk Arising from Third Party Arrangements
clauses.rationale: SA-04 acquisition; SA-09 external services; SR family supply chain.
clauses.gaps: MAS TRM has specific outsourcing risk management requirements including regulatory notification and exit management. SP 800-53 covers vendor management but MAS-specific regulatory requirements need supplementation.
